channel.title: Creating objects in delta
channel.description:
Hello, I'm trying to add firemaking to my server and I was reading a tutorial that used a source called iClarity.
He used this method to create the fire: [code]p.createObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);[/code]
where p = client.java in delta. Does anyone know the equivilant method in delta?
I would appreciate it greatly, thanks :D

item.title: Creating objects in delta
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Hand Cruel Hand
item.description:
@Cruel_Hand wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:2, topic:447639”]I just made a new class for my globalobjects, I believe the original was “newObject”

EDIT: Correction, pretty sure it’s “makeGlobalObject”

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)[/quote]

that was it! thanks a lot!

Read full topic

item.title: Creating objects in delta
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I just made a new class for my globalobjects, I believe the original was “newObject”

EDIT: Correction, pretty sure it’s “makeGlobalObject”

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)

Read full topic
